options: ['Visit the website and fill in the entry form.', 'Read the rules and share them with your parents.', 'Ask your parents to sign your entry form.', 'Do your entry on June 19, 2015.']
questions: What will you do first of all to enter the BBC Kid Reporter team?
article:
Do you dream of being a reporter? Are you a good English writer who loves the news? We're looking for 100 students from around the world. They will join the BBC Kid Reporter team for the 2015-2016 school year.
In the past, BBC Kid Reporters have:
 Interviewed leaders and other people.
 Written news stories for BBC For Kids.
 Talked about their work on television.[
Next year our team will continue to report local news stories for BBC For Kids magazine and bbcforkids.com.
How to Enter
Visitwww.bbcforkids.comand fill in the entry form  . Be sure to read the rules and share them with your parents, who must sign   your form. Entries must be done by June 19, 2015. You must be OVER 13 years of age. Good luck!
